Runners
======================

.. toctree::
    :hidden:

    Runner_Base <runners/runner_basic>
    Runner_DRL <runners/runner_drl>
    Runner_Pettingzoo <runners/runner_pettingzoo>
    Runner_SC2 <runners/runner_sc2>
    Runner_Football <runners/runner_football>
    Runner_MAgent <runners/runner_magent>
    

* :doc:`Runner_Base <runners/runner_basic>`: Basic runner that set random seeds and create vectorized environments.
* :doc:`Runner_DRL <runners/runner_drl>`: Runner for single-agent deep reinforcement learning.
* :doc:`Runner_Pettingzoo <runners/runner_pettingzoo>`: Runner for pettingzoo environments.
* :doc:`Runner_SC2 <runners/runner_sc2>`: Runner for StarCraft2 environments.
* :doc:`Runner_Football <runners/runner_football>`: Runner for Google Football environments.
* :doc:`Runner_MAgent <runners/runner_magent>`: Runner for MAgent2 environments.
